msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />That's weird. Right? Putting outside? That's real weird. Real weird.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm gonna hafta come by here every day on my walk just to see this, ! So weird!
<20_2 arg="10" />! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It looks so real!<10_4 /> Maybe I oughta bite it Just to be sure
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I come out here to stare at the . It never ever melts!<20_3 arg="3" />Is it magic, ? You can tell me.
I have got nothing to say about the <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />. It'sit's perfect.I'm not being silly. I'm just<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />real calm right now, . Real calm.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The is real neat! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Kinda looks like the stuff they make trees out of!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The looks real old!I bet it was made a loooong time ago, before I was born!<10_4 /> <20_3 arg="6" />Gotta respect the elderly, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />An outdoor school sounds kinda fun.But I'd probably get in trouble for passing notes with bugs.

The <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> looks like it belongs in an island resort<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Hang on. Thisis an island. Do wedo we live <20_2 arg="3" />in a resort?Is my house part of a resort? Are you a resort employee?!Is ANY of this REAL?!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> belongs in an office, right? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I've never seen an office.Oh! Hang on! I saw Grandma's office one time! She was in a chair, and there was a guy on a couchAnd Grandma asked me to please go outside to play. So I did! I tell yaoffices are neat!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What kinda tree was used for the ?I wonder if it was a tree from this island or someplace else?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, maybe I'll ask the bugs if they know!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What's something cute like the doing here outside?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Cute stuff in places it doesn't belong is kinda creepy! Like when I find sparkles on my houseOr a ripped dance outfit hanging from the roof, right above a weird crater in one of my flower beds!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So that's where that yummy smell was coming from! There's here!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Fruits! You can eat 'em, AND make 'em into furniture, AND draw faces on 'em, ANDcall 'em Pete!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />must be real old.Or maybe we're time traveling?! I oughta find Past Me and tell him to chill out and enjoy every donut!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That is so cool!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm gonna blow your mind. Ready? I wrote my thesis on toy furniture. It's true! It was called"Emotionalism in Toy Furniture: Recapturing Childhood with Reclaimed Materials."I was real proud of it and got a good grade! Then Grandma and Grandpa both said I did a good job!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That Reminds me of how folks say to "come out of your shell"<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />But I don't have a shell, and if I did, I'd call it a "me-bucket," because I'd be using it to carry me!A huh huh huh. A big ol' bucket fulla me walkin' around, sloshin' Yeah, I ain't getting outta that for nothin'!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />That is so cool. It's too mature for me, though.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm afraid I'd spill something on it. Then somebody'd yell at meI don't need that in my own house.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So round. Likewaaaay round. And round things roll Hey, we should build some ramps, !
